Nate Agrin

I'm a traveler, web developer, photographer, surfer and snowboarder. I'm interested in information visualization and how communities use communication technologies in creative, disruptive ways. I admire simple, minimalist design. I'm employed at Splunk as a User Interface Engineer where I aspire to make fun, useful software. I write short observations on Twitter, and longer comments here, often about technology. Lauren took this photo of me.
